quote: There are some flowers you only see when you take detours.
speaker: Saeko Tanaka

quote: Don't you dare look down! Volleyball is a sport where you're always looking up!
speaker: Keishin Ukai

quote: Talent is something you make bloom. Instinct is something you polish!
speaker: Tooru Oikawa

quote: There's no match that you can't win, and there's no match that you'll win for sure.
speaker: Ikkei Ukai

quote: Even though being smaller puts you at a disadvantage in volleyball, it doesn't make you completely helpless!
speaker: Korai Hoshiumi

quote: Hey, hey, hey!
speaker: Kotaro Bokuto

quote: It doesn't really matter what happens in the future, or if you can win your next match. The joy you feel beating the guy in front of you, and when you're able to pull out 120% of your potential, is everything.
speaker: Kotaro Bokuto

quote: Someone who can't see the opponent standing right in front of him, can't defeat the opponent that lies beyond!
speaker: Hajime Iwaizumi

quote: Guys, don't freak out! If we fall, fall forward!
speaker: Yu Nishinoya

quote: I'm Hinata Shoyo, from the concrete.
speaker: Shoyo Hinata

quote: Because people don't have wings, we look for ways to fly.
speaker: Ikkei Ukai

quote: No matter how formidable and unbeatable your opponent is, you'll never win if you don't believe you can.
speaker: Daichi Sawamura

quote: Even if I'm not big, I can fly!
speaker: Shoyo Hinata

quote: Rolling Thunder!
speaker: Yu Nishinoya

quote: Do you need a reason not to want to lose?
speaker: Shoyo Hinata

quote: The last ones standing are the victors. Only the strongest. If you want to be the last one standing, become strong.
speaker: Tobio Kageyama

quote: I told you I thought we're a strong team, but it's not me that's strong. It's everyone together.
speaker: Kenma Kozume

quote: Don't you ever forget my worthless pride.
speaker: Tooru Oikawa

quote: Luck? No Way. You're only an ace if you're able to create miracles.
speaker: Tsutomu Goshiki

quote: A sapling must have good soil in order to grow strong. Infertile soil will not bring forth splendid fruit.
speaker: Wakatoshi Ushijima

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
speaker: Shoyo Hinata

quote: Even if we're not confident that we'll win, even if others tell us we don't stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that.
speaker: Daichi Sawamura

quote: To strike past all obstaclesâ€¦. That's the ace.
speaker: Azumane Asahi

quote: Does losing prove that you are weak? Isn't losing difficult for all of you? A challenge where, after ending up on your hands and knees, you must see if you can stand up again. If you stay on your hands and knees, that proves that you are weak.
speaker: Takeda Ittetsu

quote: He who climbs the ladder must begin at the bottom.
speaker: Takeda Ittetsu
